article.title: Boeing Awarded $296 Million for Wideband Global Satellite Communications
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Boeing Satellite Systems, El Segundo, California, is being awarded a $296,137,332 firm-fixed-price, contract for modification of the Wideband Global SATCOM (WGS) Block II follow-on. The contract exercises the option to produce, process, launch, and activate on-orbit Satellite Vehicle Eight as previously negotiated.Â Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
